ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Uses a bold, modern font (Montserrat-Bold) for clarity and platform aesthetic. Vibrant pink/magenta background (FF00CC) combined with bright cyan stroke (00FFFF) and white text creates high contrast and a trendy, fun vibe, ideal for Instagram's visual focus. The pulsing animation adds dynamic urgency. Shadow and stroke enhance readability against busy video backgrounds. Two words per line create a punchy, scannable CTA.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: The magenta background (FF00CC) taps into 'fun, viral, trendy' psychology, while the cyan stroke (00FFFF) provides excellent contrast and can feel exciting and modern. The white text against this vibrant combination ensures WCAG AAA compliance (high contrast).

ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Using bold Montserrat ExtraBold for immediate impact. A vibrant pink (#FF3366) background leverages color psychology for fun and trendy content, ideal for Instagram. White text with a black stroke and shadow ensures high contrast and readability against the bright background. Pulsing animation creates a sense of urgency and keeps the CTA visible without being overwhelming. Limited words per line enhance quick scanning on a vertical format.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: The bright pink background is chosen for its association with fun, trendiness, and viral content, perfectly aligning with the goal of maximizing engagement on Instagram. The high contrast between the pink, white text, and black outline/shadow ensures WCAG AAA contrast ratios, making it accessible to a wide audience.
